ygData.subject: Re: necromancer
ygData.msgSnippet: Always get the pet spell and the life draining spell of each circle first. These spells make up the bulk of your power. Spells like fear, clinging darkness and
ygData.messageBody:
Always get the pet spell and the life draining spell of each circle first.
These
spells make up the bulk of your power. Spells like fear, clinging darkness
and poison can be exceptionally useful, but not if you don't have a pet.
-----Original Message-----
From: Nick [mailto:brutalny@...]
Sent: Thursday, June 03, 1999 12:23 AM
To: EverQuest@onelist.com
Subject: [EverQuest] necromancer


I just rolled up a dark elf necromancer. Can anyone give me some tips on
how to build up, and what spells to buy? I am new to spellcasters, i have
only played one warrior so far.
